i enjoy playing tennis.

i love iced tea.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hey, it's going well! I just finished up my last day of work for the week, so I'm feeling pretty relaxed.
Nice! I'm getting ready to go out for a drive in the countryside. I love the fresh air and the scenery.
That sounds really nice! I wish I could go with you. I love driving in the country.
Maybe you can come with me next time!
Cool! We can make a day of it and go for a hike or something too.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I'm free too! Let's do it!
Awesome! I'll start planning the details.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
